--- title: LS 빅데이터 스쿨 HW1 author: 재희 date: '2024-07-16' categories: - bigdata --- ## 데이터분석_HW # 84P ::: {#07ca238d .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df= pd.DataFrame({ "col1":[1,2,3,] }) df pd.DataFrame() df= pd.DataFrame({ '제품' : ["사과", "딸기","수박"], '가격' : [1800,1500,3000], '판매량' : [24,38,13] }) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=25} ```{=html}
제품 가격 판매량
0 사과 1800 24
1 딸기 1500 38
2 수박 3000 13
``` ::: ::: ### 가격 평균 ::: {#cf68606d .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} sum(df['가격'] / 3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=26} ``` 2100.0 ``` ::: ::: ### 판매량 평균 ::: {#104457a5 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} sum(df['판매량'] / 3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=27} ``` 25.0 ``` ::: ::: # 115p ::: {#093eb586 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd mpg = pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv") mpg mpg.shape ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=28} ``` (234, 11) ``` ::: ::: ## 01복사본 만들기 ::: {#da719eb4 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new = mpg.copy() ``` ::: ## 02수정하기 ::: {#50e0aa12 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new = mpg_new.rename(columns = {"cty":"city"}) mpg_new = mpg_new.rename(columns = {"hwy":"highway"}) mpg_new ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=30} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: # 130p ## 01. 데이터 특징 파악 ::: {#0e65f8cb .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} mid = pd.read_csv("data/midwest.csv") mid mid.head(10) mid.tail(10) mid.shape mid.info() mid.describe() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 437 entries, 0 to 436 Data columns (total 28 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 PID 437 non-null int64 1 county 437 non-null object 2 state 437 non-null object 3 area 437 non-null float64 4 poptotal 437 non-null int64 5 popdensity 437 non-null float64 6 popwhite 437 non-null int64 7 popblack 437 non-null int64 8 popamerindian 437 non-null int64 9 popasian 437 non-null int64 10 popother 437 non-null int64 11 percwhite 437 non-null float64 12 percblack 437 non-null float64 13 percamerindan 437 non-null float64 14 percasian 437 non-null float64 15 percother 437 non-null float64 16 popadults 437 non-null int64 17 perchsd 437 non-null float64 18 percollege 437 non-null float64 19 percprof 437 non-null float64 20 poppovertyknown 437 non-null int64 21 percpovertyknown 437 non-null float64 22 percbelowpoverty 437 non-null float64 23 percchildbelowpovert 437 non-null float64 24 percadultpoverty 437 non-null float64 25 percelderlypoverty 437 non-null float64 26 inmetro 437 non-null int64 27 category 437 non-null object dtypes: float64(15), int64(10), object(3) memory usage: 95.7+ KB ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=32} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## 02. 변수 수정 ::: {#496e7d3a .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} mid = pd.read_csv("data/midwest.csv") mid mid_new = mid.copy() mid_new mid_new = mid_new.rename(columns = {"poptotal":"total"}) mid_new = mid_new.rename(columns = {"popasian":"asian"}) mpg_new ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=33} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ## 03. 파생변수 만들기 ::: {#aa4dbdc7 .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.pyplot as plot mid_new["ratio"] = mid_new["asian"]/mid_new["total"] *100 mid_new mid_new["ratio"].plot.hist() plot.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-11-output-1.png){width=593 height=411} ::: ::: ## 04. 합격 판정 변수 ::: {#a0a9f0f6 .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np x=mid_new["ratio"].mean() mid_new["group"]= np.where(mid_new["ratio"]>x,"large","small") mid_new["group"] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=35} ``` 0 small 1 small 2 small 3 small 4 small ... 432 large 433 small 434 small 435 large 436 large Name: group, Length: 437, dtype: object ``` ::: ::: ## 05. 막대그래프 ::: {#a510fc03 .cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} count_group = mid_new["group"].value_counts() count_group count_group.plot.bar(rot = 0) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-13-output-1.png){width=575 height=429} ::: :::
